TestGroupDocumentation.Title: totalDigits3 Validate Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the on-demand validator of trees got by unmarshalling of a totalDigits-3.xsd based XML document and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a positiveInteger restricted SimpleType with totalDigits value 9.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML positiveInteger totalDigits-3.xsd, validate unmarshalled then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls totalDigits-3-1.xml document which specifies valid value 2 for the positiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-positiveInteger-totalDigits-3 element, sets the values: 999999999, 100000000, 10000000, 1000000, 100000, 10000, 1000, 100, 10, 1 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML positiveInteger totalDigits-3.xsd, validate unmarshalled then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls totalDigits-3-1.xml document which specifies valid value 2 for the positiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-positiveInteger-totalDigits-3 element, sets the values: 1000000000, 0, -100000000, -999999999 and expects validation to fail.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML positiveInteger totalDigits-3.xsd validate dynamically created then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of positiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-positiveInteger-totalDigits-3 type, sets the values: 999999999, 100000000, 10000000, 1000000, 100000, 10000, 1000, 100, 10, 1 and expects the validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML positiveInteger totalDigits-3.xsd validate dynamically created then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of positiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-positiveInteger-totalDigits-3 type, sets the values: 1000000000, 0, -100000000, -999999999 and expects validation to fail.
